That was it for that night. Other nights in the same house we recorded and =
heard plenty more. I heard a man's voice that said "he knows" oneearly morn=
ing. Our entire group heard a scared 7 year old little girl telling us she =
couldn't come down stairs because she wasn't allowed by another entity. We =
knew she was 7 because she told us. We also measured a 10 degree temperatur=
e drop with that one. We sat a small stuffed rabbit on the stairs to get he=
r to come down but she wouldn't because she was terrified.
=A0
Frank R.

--=

Nothing more? LOL Just the hello and that was it?
Al

iginal Message ----------

There was no question, the ghost said Hell=
o! I just said hello back and looked in the area (2 ft from me in the corne=
r) where the voice came from. LOL
=A0
Frank R.

I record=
ed at a=A0 100 year old beach house investigation in 2004 and not only hear=
d real time, "Hello" with my ears but caught it on camera and my reaction t=
o it.
=A0
Frank R.

--- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com> w=
rote:


From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gmail. com>
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New =
ideas
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:40 PM



=


I am curious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever =
gotten any EVP in real time.
=A0
I=A0took part in=A0an investigation of Ash=
more Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras =
set up in the three halls of the building. The video for all=A0was being mo=
nitored and recorded=A0at a central location. Alas, we did not have microph=
ones at the camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we=
 might have heard if we did?
=A0
Zack

=A0
